excerpt: "Artificial Intelligence (AI)-driven biomarker discovery innovator Scailyte announced today that Michael Brenner MD, Elizabeth Fay Brigham Professor of Medicine at Harvard Medical School, has joined Scailyte as an advisor to the Board of Directors."
